description: The Spartans are an independent terrorist organization dedicated to hunting down and trapping non-human species with animal characteristics (that means they don't pursue IPC's, for example). As far as known, they are being sponsored by unknown third-party and The Syndicate. Despite that, they have complete freedom of action on their territories. The Sparta-class ship represents a battle cruiser with large arsenal and two assault pods, that allow to engage and board other ships.
